txt.en: 'The horse is acting strange as of late. He keeps staring to the south-east, always focused there. It's as if something is out there waiting for him, and he knows it.'

'So, he is eager to return to his herd? It warms my heart to hear he received his calling. I hope to see him one day returned to his true home.'

<rgb=#00FF00>Completing this quest will grant the Favour of the Mearas skill.</rgb>  

<rgb=#FF0000>Note: The skill from this quest can only be used while mounted on a war-steed in the fields of Rohan.</rgb>

The horse stamps at the ground and looks anxious to be free of his stall, out running free....\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This quest begins a special session quest. You will be logged out of your normal character and take on the guise of a player-friendly npc. You will not be able to leave the region the character starts in, as this character and will attain a set of skills unique to this special player character.</rgb>

The horse paws at the ground and looks anxious to be free of his stall, and out running free...\n\n'<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This quest begins a special session quest. You will be logged out of your normal character and take on the guise of a player-friendly npc. You will not be able to leave the region the character starts in, as this character and will attain a set of skills unique to this special player character.</rgb>'
For centuries the Mearas have freely roamed the plains of Rohan, only bowing before the kings and princes of the Rohirrim.
Check on the horse from Combe
The horse appears to be staring off into the distance, as if he now knows where he needs to go.
